synopsis.text: Scholar, and collect seven more Stella Stars to achieve this. Meanwhile, Loid, her adoptive father and covert agent, juggles his mission to prevent a war between Ostan and Westalis while maintaining his cover as a devoted family man. When Loid receives a new assignment to thwart an assassination plot targeting Westalis' Minister Brantz, the family's secret lives become even more entwined. As Loid races to stop the terrorists, Anya discovers their hideout and befriends a gentle, psychic dog named Bond. Despite their unconventional circumstances and hidden identities, the Forger family remains a united front, navigating through the challenges and embracing their new furry companion.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
